mapper.select: SELECT SEQ_ATTENDANCE.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ATTENDANCE ( ATTEND_NUM, USER_NO, USER_NAME, ATTEND_DATE, NORMAL_CHECK, IRREGULAR_REASON ) VALUES ( #{attend_num}, #{user_no}, #{user_name}, SYSDATE, '근무정보없음', '근무정보없음' )
INSERT INTO WORKTIME ( WORKTIME_NUM, USER_NO, ATTEND_DATE, IN_TIME, OUT_TIME, WORKCHECK, TOTAL_WORK_TIME ) VALUES ( '0', #{user_no}, SYSDATE, '0', '0', '근무정보없음', '0' )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(ATTEND_NUM) AS "ATTEND_NUM" FROM ATTENDANCE WHERE USER_NO = #{user_no} AND NORMAL_CHECK != '정상근무'
SELECT * FROM WORKTIME WHERE USER_NO = #{user_no} AND TO_CHAR(ATTEND_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE - 1,'YYYYMMDD')
SELECT COUNT(*) AS ATTEND_MOD_NUM FROM ATTENDANCEMODIFY WHERE USER_NO = #{user_no} AND TO_CHAR(REQ_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') AND APPROVE_STATE != '승인됨'

SELECT WORKTIME_NUM, USER_NO, ATTEND_DATE, REGEXP_REPLACE(IN_TIME, '(.{2})(.{2})(.{2})', '\1시 \2분 \3초') AS IN_TIME, REGEXP_REPLACE(OUT_TIME, '(.{2})(.{2})(.{2})', '\1시 \2분 \3초') AS OUT_TIME, WORKCHECK, ROUND(TOTAL_WORK_TIME / 3600, 3) AS TOTAL_WORK_TIME FROM WORKTIME WHERE USER_NO = #{user_no} AND TO_CHAR(ATTEND_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD')

SELECT TO_CHAR(ATTEND_DATE,'MM') AS ATTEND_DATE, ROUND(SUM(TOTAL_WORK_TIME) / 3600, 3) AS TOTAL_WORK_TIME FROM WORKTIME WHERE USER_NO = #{user_no} AND TO_CHAR(ATTEND_DATE,'MM') = CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(ATTEND_DATE,'MM') = '01' THEN '01' WHEN TO_CHAR(ATTEND_DATE,'MM') = '02' THEN '02' WHEN TO_CHAR(ATTEND_DATE,'MM') = '03' THEN '03' WHEN TO_CHAR(ATTEND_DATE,'MM') = '04' THEN '04' WHEN TO_CHAR(ATTEND_DATE,'MM') = '05' THEN '05' WHEN TO_CHAR(ATTEND_DATE,'MM') = '06' THEN '06' WHEN TO_CHAR(ATTEND_DATE,'MM') = '07' THEN '07' WHEN TO_CHAR(ATTEND_DATE,'MM') = '08' THEN '08' WHEN TO_CHAR(ATTEND_DATE,'MM') = '09' THEN '09' WHEN TO_CHAR(ATTEND_DATE,'MM') = '10' THEN '10' WHEN TO_CHAR(ATTEND_DATE,'MM') = '11' THEN '11' WHEN TO_CHAR(ATTEND_DATE,'MM') = '12' THEN '12' END GROUP BY TO_CHAR(ATTEND_DATE,'MM')

SELECT A.ATTEND_DATE, A.WORK_NUMOFDATE, M.ATTEND_MOD_NUM, W.TOTAL_WORK_TIME FROM ATTENDANCE A INNER JOIN ATTENDANCEMODIFY M ON(A.ATTEND_NUM = M.ATTEND_NUM) INNER JOIN WORKTIME W ON(M.ATTEND_NUM = W.ATTEND_NUM)
SELECT SEQ_WORKTIME.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
mapper.update: UPDATE WORKTIME SET WORKTIME_NUM = #{worktime_num}, IN_TIME = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'HH24MISS'), WORKCHECK = CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'HH24MISS')) < 080000 THEN '정상출근처리' WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'HH24MISS')) > 080000 THEN '지각출근처리' END WHERE WORKTIME_NUM = 0

UPDATE ATTENDANCE SET NORMAL_CHECK = CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'HH24MISS')) < 080000 THEN '정상출근' WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'HH24MISS')) > 080000 THEN '지각' END WHERE TO_CHAR(ATTEND_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD')
UPDATE ATTENDANCE SET IRREGULAR_REASON = CASE WHEN NORMAL_CHECK = '정상출근' THEN '이상없음' WHEN NORMAL_CHECK = '지각' THEN '이상근무(지각)' END WHERE TO_CHAR(ATTEND_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD')

UPDATE WORKTIME SET OUT_TIME = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'HH24MISS'), WORKCHECK = CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'HH24MISS')) < 080000 THEN '정상퇴근처리' WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'HH24MISS')) > 080000 THEN '지각퇴근처리' END WHERE TO_CHAR(ATTEND_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD')

UPDATE WORKTIME SET TOTAL_WORK_TIME = ( (SUBSTR(OUT_TIME, 1, 2) * 3600) + (SUBSTR(OUT_TIME, 3, 2) * 60) + (SUBSTR(OUT_TIME, 5, 2) * 1) )
-
( (SUBSTR(IN_TIME, 1, 2) * 3600) + (SUBSTR(IN_TIME, 3, 2) * 60) + (SUBSTR(IN_TIME, 5, 2) * 1) ) WHERE TO_CHAR(ATTEND_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD')
UPDATE ATTENDANCE SET NORMAL_CHECK = CASE WHEN NORMAL_CHECK = '정상출근' THEN '정상근무' WHEN NORMAL_CHECK = '지각' THEN '지각' END WHERE TO_CHAR(ATTEND_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD')
UPDATE ATTENDANCE SET IRREGULAR_REASON = CASE WHEN NORMAL_CHECK = '정상근무' THEN '이상없음' WHEN NORMAL_CHECK = '지각' THEN '이상근무(지각)' END WHERE TO_CHAR(ATTEND_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD')
UPDATE WORKTIME SET WORKCHECK = CASE WHEN WORKCHECK = '정상퇴근처리' THEN '정상출근처리(재)' WHEN WORKCHECK = '지각퇴근처리' THEN '지각출근처리(재)' END WHERE TO_CHAR(ATTEND_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD')

UPDATE WORKTIME SET OUT_TIME = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'HH24MISS'), WORKCHECK = CASE WHEN WORKCHECK = '정상출근처리(재)' THEN '정상퇴근처리' WHEN WORKCHECK = '지각출근처리(재)' THEN '지각퇴근처리' END, TOTAL_WORK_TIME = ( SUBSTR(OUT_TIME, 1, 2) * 60 * 60 + SUBSTR(OUT_TIME, 3, 2) * 60 + SUBSTR(OUT_TIME, 5, 2) )
-
( SUBSTR(IN_TIME, 1, 2) * 60 * 60 + SUBSTR(IN_TIME, 3, 2) * 60 + SUBSTR(IN_TIME, 5, 2) ) WHERE TO_CHAR(ATTEND_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD')
mapper.select: SELECT SEQ_ATTENDANCEMODIFY.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ATTENDANCEMODIFY ( ATTEND_MOD_NUM, USER_NO, USER_NAME, REQ_DATE, MODIFY_REQ_DATE, MOD_REASON, REJECT_REASON, ATTACH_FILE, ATTACH_FILE_SIZE, APPROVE_STATE ) VALUES ( #{attend_mod_num}, #{user_no}, #{user_name}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'), CONCAT(CONCAT(SUBSTR(#{modify_req_date}, 1, 4), SUBSTR(#{modify_req_date}, 7, 2)), SUBSTR(#{modify_req_date}, 11, 2)), #{mod_reason}, '내용없음', '첨부파일 없음', 0, '처리중' )
mapper.select: SELECT REGEXP_REPLACE(TO_CHAR(ATTEND_DATE,'YYYYMMDD'), '(.{4})(.{2})(.{2})', '\1년 \2월 \3일') AS ATTEND_DATE, REGEXP_REPLACE(IN_TIME, '(.{2})(.{2})(.{2})', '\1시 \2분 \3초') AS IN_TIME, REGEXP_REPLACE(OUT_TIME, '(.{2})(.{2})(.{2})', '\1시 \2분 \3초') AS OUT_TIME, WORKCHECK FROM WORKTIME WHERE USER_NO = #{user_no}
SELECT COUNT(WORKTIME_NUM) FROM WORKTIME

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, WT.* FROM ( SELECT WORKTIME_NUM, REGEXP_REPLACE(TO_CHAR(ATTEND_DATE,'YYYYMMDD'), '(.{4})(.{2})(.{2})', '\1년 \2월 \3일') AS ATTEND_DATE, REGEXP_REPLACE(IN_TIME, '(.{2})(.{2})(.{2})', '\1시 \2분 \3초') AS IN_TIME, REGEXP_REPLACE(OUT_TIME, '(.{2})(.{2})(.{2})', '\1시 \2분 \3초') AS OUT_TIME, WORKCHECK FROM WORKTIME WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} ORDER BY WORKTIME_NUM ) WT ) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}

SELECT ATTEND_MOD_NUM, TO_CHAR(REQ_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') AS REQ_DATE, USER_NAME, MOD_REASON, ATTACH_FILE, APPROVE_STATE, TO_CHAR(MODIFY_REQ_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') AS MODIFY_REQ_DATE FROM ATTENDANCEMODIFY WHERE USER_NO = #{user_no} ORDER BY ATTEND_MOD_NUM

SELECT ATTEND_MOD_NUM, TO_CHAR(REQ_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') AS REQ_DATE, USER_NAME, MOD_REASON, ATTACH_FILE, APPROVE_STATE, TO_CHAR(MODIFY_REQ_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') AS MODIFY_REQ_DATE FROM ATTENDANCEMODIFY WHERE APPROVE_STATE != '승인됨' AND APPROVE_STATE != '반려됨' ORDER BY ATTEND_MOD_NUM
SELECT COUNT(ATTEND_MOD_NUM) FROM ATTENDANCEMODIFY WHERE APPROVE_STATE != '승인됨'
mapper.update: UPDATE ATTENDANCE SET NORMAL_CHECK = '정상근무', IRREGULAR_REASON = '이상없음' WHERE TO_CHAR(ATTEND_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') = #{modify_req_date}
UPDATE WORKTIME SET WORKCHECK = '정상퇴근처리' WHERE TO_CHAR(ATTEND_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') = #{modify_req_date}
